segments.text: I can't believe how much water is overflowing from that sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman just keeps drying dishes like nothing's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's so frustrating to see her just standing there, oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the edge, making such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why she hasn't noticed the puddle at her feet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just ridiculous, how can she not see what's going on?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets and floor are going to get ruined if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like shouting at her to turn off the faucet already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just so infuriating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to do something about this before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
